lead_paragraph: Playing in the Bronx one last time, Boston Red Sox star David Ortiz was given a 30-second standing ovation at Yankee Stadium instead of the usual boos.

headline.print_headline: David Ortiz Given Standing Ovation in Yankee Stadium Finale
headline.main: David Ortiz Given Standing Ovation in Yankee Stadium Finale
